page.title: 14Crichel Estate Farms
page.content:
WHITE FARM The Workers: There are 12 men that work the Estate and live in Estate houses. There are also 2 working wives and 1 working daughter. There is also a farm secretary.
Farm Machinery: 13 Ford tractors 2 Drills 2 Sprayers plus a contract helicopter 3 Combines + 3 hired at harvest Plus various ploughs, harrows and equipment for dealing with the slurry.
Game: The shooting rights are owned by Cdr. Marten, apart from 4 days in the season when a group of Americans shoot A normal shoot has 7 guns plus beaters There are approx. 8000 chicks reared each year. The deer shooting rights are owned by a Belgian syndicate.
